title: Cloud Bloc™
dsp: Cloud Bloc™  is an innovative initiative tailored for undergraduate students seeking an affordable and efficient solution to host their websites. Our project offers a comprehensive package that transforms a physical server into a Virtual Private Server (VPS) environment. CloudBloc enables them to access affordable resources, preventing unnecessary expenditure on costly hosting services.
